wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Henderson (1 October 1927 – 31 May 2013) was an English professional footballer who played as an outside forward. He appeared in the Football League for his hometown team Burnley, playing two senior matches for the club. He later moved into non-League football, assisting Rossendale United, Nelson and Bank Hall Colliery.

response: * Tommy Henderson (Thomas Gibson Henderson, 1887–1970), Independent Unionist politician from Belfast
